about_the_game:
Cardia, a world of breathtaking vastness

Find hidden objects in the large open world.
Craft your tools to delve into the depths of Cardia faster and more efficiently.

Various life skills can be improved through "learning-by-doing", which will help you fight stronger enemies.
Interact with your world, the characters and learn secrets in the world of Cardia.

Game Overview:
Cardia is a single-player open world RPG set in a fantasy world. The player takes on the role of an adventurer who must explore and complete various quests to progress through the game. The game features an expansive open world filled with dungeons, monsters, NPCs, and other surprises for players to discover. Players will be able to customize their character's appearance and abilities as they progress through the game.

Features:
• Character Customization - Players can customize their character’s appearance by selecting from a variety of hair styles, skin tones, clothing options, etc. They can also choose which skills and abilities they want their character to have such as magic spells or combat techniques.
• Open World Exploration - Cardia features an expansive open world that players can explore at their own pace. As they travel around the map they will encounter new areas filled with enemies to fight or puzzles to solve in order to progress further into the game.
• Quests & Side Activities - Alongside completing main story missions there are side activities available for players such as fishing or hunting mini-games that reward them with items or experience points when completed successfully. There are also optional side quests available throughout the game that provide rewards upon completion such as rare items or currency used for purchasing upgrades from vendors located throughout the map.
• Combat System - Cardia has a turn based combat system where players take turns attacking each other using physical attacks or magical spells depending on what type of class they chose during customization phase of gameplay . Enemies encountered while exploring have varying levels of difficulty so it is important for players to plan ahead before engaging in battle against tougher opponents .
